EmailTemplate.name: Event - Partner Day 2015.Email - 1 Day Reminder - Partner Day
EmailTemplate.subject: Partner Day 2015: 1 Day To Go!
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear {{lead.First Name}}, Don’t forget, Partner Day starts tomorrow at 1:30 PM! We are looking forward to welcoming you to an inspiring day discussing the future of Tricentis and software testing, followed by dinner, drinks, and networking. Location: Novomatic Forum Friedrichstraße 7 1010 Wien How to get there: The Novomatic Forum is easily accessible by public transportation. Simply take the U1 (Red), U2 (Purple) or U4 (Green) subway line to Karlsplatz, and exit towards "Secession". It is about a 3 minute walk to the Novomatic Forum. Parking Information: For those arriving by car, there is a public garage a short walk from the Novomatic Forum. A one day parking voucher costs €37, to be paid to the garage. Parking: WIPARK Garage Operngasse 13 1040 Wien See you soon in Vienna! Best Regards, Your Tricentis Events Team
